author: pierred
msg: Latest web.dtd in sync with catalina.

author: pierred
msg: Support for the following PFD changes:
"- Added initialization parameters to TagLibraryInformation validation in TLD, adding a
new <validator> element, renaming <validatorclass> to <validator-class> for consistency,
and adding <init-param> as in the Servlet web.xml descriptor.
- Added method to pass the initialization parameters to the validator class and removed the
use of TagLibraryInfo. Added prefix and uri String arguments to validate() method."

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the tag library descriptor to the JSP 1.2 PFD version.
NOTE:  Jasper needs to update its version of the webapp deployment

author: pierred
msg: "Changed element names in TLD to consistently follow convention. New names are <tag-class>.
